desc: Hello everyone,We are looking for experienced persons with helping crowdfunding projects.Read everything very carefully before you bid. Don't bid urgently without reading. We'll have time for you so take your time and read and then bid.If you are not experienced with promoting crowd funding projects or if you don't have any list of genuine backers for crowdfunding project who willing to fund money for such projects when you convince them, then please ignore this. Otherwise you'll only waste your time and mine. We will pay based on your performance. If you can bring many backers and increase our funds in the crowdfund project you'll receive more money than we added as the price range here. As we are fund raising because we need a capital for the work and therefore we will not put any money for any freelancer without results.So the condition is simple, you have to convince us your experience and we'll release the money only when you bring backers to our project and when they have funded us more money. And if you can work beyond our expectations and if we raised beyond our goal or at least we receive 90% of the goal you'll surely share a small percentage from the project's amount too. Maybe between $700-$1000. That is a fixed promise and if you can help to raise more than $10,000 then we'll share $1200-$1700 with you based on the raised amount.Remember to include the text 'i know how to crowdfund' at the very top of your proposal and otherwise you'll not be selected. If you are a new freelancer without reviews we are happy to have you too. But remember we'll not share a single penny before you bring us backers and money to the fund. If you can do that you'll have over $750 as your first project as in the above fixed promise of us.Therefore if you can bring real backers then no need to worry about your money. And also we need some results in at least one week. (Not completely received the goal amount. But have some money at least 10%-20% of the goal)[url removed, login to view]
title: Bring funders and backers to a Indiegogo Crowd funding Project
